about_the_game:
Conflict FPS is a multiplayer 1st person shooter. This fast-paced combat shooter offers a variety of maps and several game modes each with their own objective. You can create your own game server and choose from a variety of gameplay options or join an existing game on the server.

GAME MODES

Team Death Match
Join a team and work with your teammates to kill as many of the opposing team members as you can before the time runs out.

Capture The Flag
Capture the enemy team flag and return it to your flag position as many times as you can before the time runs out.

Kill Confirmed
Collect dog tags from the enemy when you or your teammate kills them. Collect your own team dog tags to prevent the other team from getting them.

Free for All
Defeat as many of your enemies as possible before the time runs out. this is not a team-based game mode.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is a shooting game and depicts acts of violence in a manner that can represent a character in the game being shot.

detailed_description:
Conflict FPS is a multiplayer 1st person shooter. This fast-paced combat shooter offers a variety of maps and several game modes each with their own objective. You can create your own game server and choose from a variety of gameplay options or join an existing game on the server.

GAME MODES

Team Death Match
Join a team and work with your teammates to kill as many of the opposing team members as you can before the time runs out.

Capture The Flag

Defeat as many of your enemies as possible before the time runs out. this is not a team-based game mode.
ext_user_account_notice: Registration with a non-steam database will be created the first time you run the game and is required to join and play this game.
name: Conflict FPS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit
  • Graphics: DX10 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK.

short_description: Conflict FPS is a fast-paced online multiplayer first-person shooter. Create your own game room and choose your preferred mission type and rules or join an existing game server and help bring your team to victory.
